name: Zombie Shooter: Ares Virus
summary: In year 2037, a pandemic of an unknown plague virus infection wiped out most of world animals and citizens. The world turns into a dead zone and survivors’ lives are threatened with zombies! The places you liked to hang out are now full of undead walking zombies and people you know has disappeared. Blood and deadly venom spreads everywhere. How will you survive in this zombie pandemic game?
